name: AXDataSeriesDescriptor
desc: An object that represents a series of data points.

items.name: init(name: String, isContinuous: Bool, dataPoints: [AXDataPoint])
items.desc: Creates a data series with the specified name, a Boolean value that indicates whether the series is continuous, and data points.

items.name: init(attributedName: NSAttributedString, isContinuous: Bool, dataPoints: [AXDataPoint])
items.desc: Creates a data series with the specified attributed name, a Boolean value that indicates whether the series is continuous, and data points.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name of the data series.

items.name: var attributedName: NSAttributedString
items.desc: An attributed version of the data series name.

items.name: var isContinuous: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the data series is continuous.

items.name: var dataPoints: [AXDataPoint]
items.desc: The data points that the series contains.

items.name: class AXDataPoint
items.desc: An object that represents a single data point in a chart.
